unte jabai ik ni galeiþa, parakletus ni qimiþ at izwis;
aþþan jabai gagga, sandja ina du izwis.
JOHN 16.8 jah qimands is gasakiþ þo manaseþ bi frawaurht jah bi garaihtiþa jah bi staua;
JOHN 16.9 bi frawaurht raihtis, þatei ni galaubjand du mis;
JOHN 16.10 iþ bi garaihtiþa, þatei du attin meinamma gagga, jah ni þanaseiþs saiƕiþ mik;
JOHN 16.11 iþ bi staua, þatei sa reiks þis fairƕaus afdomiþs warþ.
JOHN 16.12 Nauh ganoh skal qiþan izwis, akei ni maguþ frabairan nu.
JOHN 16.13 iþ þan qimiþ jains, ahma sunjos, briggiþ izwis in allai sunjai;
nih þan rodeiþ af sis silbin ak swa filu swe hauseiþ rodeiþ, jah þata anawairþo gateihiþ izwis.
JOHN 16.14 jains mik hauheiþ, unte us meinamma nimiþ jah gateihiþ izwis.
JOHN 16.15 all þatei aih atta, mein ist;
duhþe qaþ þatei us meinamma nimiþ jah gateihiþ izwis.
JOHN 16.16 Leitil nauh jah ni saiƕiþ mik; jah aftra leitil jah gasaiƕiþ mik, unte ik gagga du attin.
JOHN 16.17 þaruh qeþun us þaim siponjam is du sis misso:
ƕa ist þata þatei qiþiþ unsis: leitil ei ni saiƕiþ mik, jah aftra leitil jah gasaiƕiþ mik, jah þatei ik gagga du attin?
þata ƕa sijai þatei qiþiþ: leitil
JOHN 16.19 iþ Iesus wissuh þatei wildedun ina fraihnan jah qaþ im:
bi þata sokeiþ miþ izwis misso þatei qaþ:
leitil jah ni saiƕiþ mik, jah aftra leitil jah gasaiƕiþ mik.
JOHN 16.20 amen, amen, qiþa izwis þei greitiþ jah gaunoþ jus, iþ manaseþs faginoþ;
jus saurgandans wairþiþ, akei so saurga izwara du fahedai wairþiþ.
JOHN 16.21 qino, þan bairiþ, saurga habaid, unte qam ƕeila izos;
iþ biþe gabauran ist barn, ni þanaseiþs ni gaman þizos aglons faura fahedai, unte gabaurans warþ manna in fairƕau.
JOHN 16.22 jah þan jus auk nu saurga habaiþ, iþ aftra saiƕa izwis jah faginoþ izwar hairto, jah þo fahed izwara ni ainshun nimiþ af izwis.
JOHN 16.23 jah in jainamma daga mik ni fraihniþ waihtais.
amen amen, qiþa izwis þatei þisƕah þei bidjiþ attan in namin meinamma, gibiþ izwis.
JOHN 16.24 und hita ni beduþ ni waihtais in namin meinamma;
bidjaiþ jah nimiþ, ei faheþs izwara sijai usfullida.
JOHN 16.25 þata in gajukom rodida izwis;
akei qimiþ ƕeila, þanuh izwis ni þanaseiþs in gajukom rodja, ak andaugiba bi attan gateiha izwis.
JOHN 16.26 in jainamma daga in namin meinamma bidjiþ, jah ni qiþa izwis þei ik bidjau attan bi izwis;
JOHN 16.27 ak silba atta frijoþ izwis, unte jus mik frijodeduþ jah galaubideduþ þatei ik fram guda urrann.
JOHN 16.28 uz-iddja uh fram attin jah atiddja in þana fairƕu;
aftra bileiþa þamma fairƕau jah gagga du attin.
JOHN 16.29 þaruh qeþun þai siponjos is:
sai, nu andaugiba rodeis jah gajukono ni ainohun qiþis.
JOHN 16.30 nu witum ei þu kant alla, jah ni þarft ei þuk ƕas fraihnai;
bi þamma galaubjam þatei þu fram guda urrant.
JOHN 16.32 sai, qimiþ ƕeila jah nu qam, ei distahjada ƕarjizuh du seinaim, jah mik ainana bileiþiþ;
jah ni im ains, unte atta miþ mis ist.
JOHN 16.33 þata rodida izwis, þei in mis gawairþi aigeiþ.
JOHN 17.1 þata rodida Iesus uz-hof-uh augona seina du himina jah qaþ:
hauhei þeinana sunu, ei sunus þeins hauhjai þuk; JOHN 17.2 swaswe atgaft imma waldufni allaize leike, ei all þatei atgaft imma, gibai im libain aiweinon.
JOHN 17.3 soh þan ist so aiweino libains, ei kunneina þuk ainana sunjana guþ jah þanei insandides, Iesu Xristu.
JOHN 17.4 ik þuk hauhida ana airþai;
waurstw ustauh þatei atgaft mis du waurkjan.
JOHN 17.5 jah nu hauhei mik, þu atta, at þus silbin þamma wulþau, þanei habaida at þus, faurþizei sa fairƕus wesi.
